医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
HEPA 空气净化器在减少老年护理机构的呼吸道感染方面效果不佳对老年护理中的 HEPA-14 空气净化器的研究表明，它对呼吸道感染没有显着影响，尽管初步阶段的结果表明有潜在的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/HEPA-air-purifiers-fall-short-in-cutting-respiratory-infections-in-ged-care-facilities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/HEPA-air-purifiers-fall-short-in-cutting-respiratory-infections-in-ged-care-facilities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a0ab772-df3f-4a8b-8b76-4a1dd601008f Wed, 13 Nov 2024 07:39:00 -0500 HEPA air purifiers fall short in cutting respiratory infections in aged-care facilities
POINT 项目推出视频展示其医疗保健进步POINT 是一个由欧盟资助的创新项目，致力于为受 Covid-19 影响的个人提供医疗保健服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/POINT-project-launches-video-to-showcase-its-healthcare-advancements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/POINT-project-launches-video-to-showcase-its-healthcare-advancements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baf5d3cb-9776-4085-949a-4f1b98f74faf Wed, 13 Nov 2024 07:23:57 -0500
更多的绿色空间可以减少贫困地区可预防的死亡《流行病学与社区健康杂志》在线发表的研究发现，在英国 4 个国家中的 3 个最贫困的城市社区中，只要多提供 1% 的绿地，就可能使这些地区可预防的死亡人数减少约 40%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/More-green-space-could-reduce-preventable-deaths-in-deprived-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/More-green-space-could-reduce-preventable-deaths-in-deprived-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46d2d60a-dbeb-43bc-b9f0-b881daec3b35 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 07:21:49 -0500 More green space could reduce preventable deaths in deprived areas
了解青少年吸电子烟背后的多种原因尼古丁电子烟有时被作为戒烟辅助工具出售。然而，根据密歇根大学的研究，青少年通常不会使用电子尼古丁电子烟来抑制吸烟习惯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Understanding-the-diverse-reasons-behind-teen-vaping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Understanding-the-diverse-reasons-behind-teen-vaping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c067441f-3133-4167-9c7a-529e15603fa1 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 06:30:22 -0500 Understanding the diverse reasons behind teen vaping
新研究将昼夜节律基因变异与冬季抑郁症联系起来PER3基因的变体破坏了肾上腺对冬季光线的适应，导致人源化小鼠模型中血清素破坏和抑郁样行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/New-study-links-circadian-gene-variants-to-winter-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/New-study-links-circadian-gene-variants-to-winter-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8852d06-3b10-472f-bf2f-de0b846f97a2 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 06:19:00 -0500 New study links circadian gene variants to winter depression
IsDB 与世卫组织合作，加强具有气候适应能力的卫生系统作为对加强初级卫生保健和卫生系统复原力全球倡议承诺的一部分，伊斯兰开发银行（IsDB）今天宣布向世卫组织拨款 1000 万美元，用于实施健康影响力投资平台（HIIP） 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/IsDB-partners-with-WHO-to-boost-climate-resilient-health-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/IsDB-partners-with-WHO-to-boost-climate-resilient-health-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84db3030-e927-4d13-b121-d19cdcd1502e Wed, 13 Nov 2024 06:13:10 -0500
马里兰州正在培训更多卫生工作者提供堕胎护理马里兰州东北部农村地区，护士萨曼莎·马西 (Samantha Marsee) 诊所周围的两个县没有一家提供堕胎服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Maryland-is-training-more-health-workers-to-offer-abortion-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Maryland-is-training-more-health-workers-to-offer-abortion-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84ed9162-ebc2-49a8-b1ea-acb818ee1118 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 06:07:06 -0500 Maryland is training more health workers to offer abortion care
研究表明β受体阻滞剂可能会加重心肌梗死后患者的抑郁症状在心脏功能保留的心肌梗死患者中，β-受体阻滞剂与更严重的抑郁症状有关，表明需要进行仔细的心理健康评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Study-suggests-beta-blockers-may-elevate-depression-symptoms-in-post-MI-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Study-suggests-beta-blockers-may-elevate-depression-symptoms-in-post-MI-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9454dfa8-0654-4568-8d6e-15de9be78f8f Wed, 13 Nov 2024 05:50:00 -0500 Study suggests beta-blockers may elevate depression symptoms in post-MI patients
营养与传统医学的协同作用，促进整体健康和福祉研究人员探索营养和传统医学如何支持整体健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/The-synergy-of-nutrition-and-traditional-medicine-for-holistic-health-and-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/The-synergy-of-nutrition-and-traditional-medicine-for-holistic-health-and-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb3226a7-38bb-4c61-b2c6-d28d0991e0ef Wed, 13 Nov 2024 05:47:00 -0500 The synergy of nutrition and traditional medicine for holistic health and wellbeing
全球研究凸显老年人 COVID-19 疫苗接种覆盖率的不平等研究人员对老年人中的 COVID-19 疫苗接种计划进行了全球概述。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Inequities-in-COVID-19-vaccination-coverage-for-older-adults-highlighted-in-global-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Inequities-in-COVID-19-vaccination-coverage-for-older-adults-highlighted-in-global-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7485cf51-6bfe-4708-ac5f-754b45c102fa Wed, 13 Nov 2024 05:36:00 -0500 Inequities in COVID-19 vaccination coverage for older adults highlighted in global study
